description: 11 You can place yourself into a trance so deep that you are almost in suspended animation. Even powers that detect life or thought are incapable of deter- mining that you are alive. While you are suspended, you are aware of your surroundings. You feel the passage of one day for every year that actually passes. Though on a slower schedule, you grow hungry af- Swarm of Display: ter a “day” without food (though a year Crystals Material passes in actuality) and begin to suffer Metacreativity Manifesting the effects of thirst and starvation (Creation) Time: 1 standard as appropriate.
